description:
Keep the trail from trying to come home with you. With their high sock knit cuff, the Freerider Pro Mids keep your feet warmer, and cleaner, which is always nice. The sock knit cuff not only traps out cold and chunder, it also has D3O inner ankle protection, taking the edge off of knocks to your ankle bone. The stiff shank delivers excellent power transfer, while the Stealth rubber keeps you connected to your pedals.

  • Burly synthetic upper wears well and dries faster than leather
  • D3O® padding at your ankle bone helps soften impacts
  • Hook-and-loop straps are easy to adjust on the trail, or with cold hands
  • OrthoLite™ sock liner wicks away moisture
  • EVA midsole for added shock absorption
  • Mid-flex midsole for efficient pedaling
  • Stealth® S1™ rubber outsole sticks like glue even in cold weather
  • Classic Dotty™ tread stays clean
name: Five Ten Freerider Pro Mid VCS Cycling Shoes - Men's
